attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This week Shakil Chowdhury was given a 6 year sentance for abducting and rapeing a 12 year old girl 11 times. While he held the girl captive he also invited 3 of his friends around to sexually abuse the girl. He has still not helped police capture these other men, surely this proves the only sorrow he feels is that he got caught. This is not justice, sort it out.
